title: Dan Wootton denies catfishing claim by 'former colleague'
description: In High Court documents, the broadcaster said he did not trick a man into sending him explicit photos.
content:
Broadcaster and journalist Dan Wootton has responded to a court claim against him, denying that he catfished a man who says he was a former colleague.

title: UN security council votes to endorse Donald Trump’s Gaza plan
description: The resolution, which includes references to an independent Palestine, was passed by a vote of 13-0 with China and Russia abstaining
content:
The UN security council has endorsed proposals put forward by Donald Trump for a lasting peace in Gaza, including the deployment of an international stabilisation force and a possible path to a sovereign Palestinian state.
The resolution, passed by a... [4780 chars]

title: Celebrity MasterChef 2025 - Meet the celebrities cooking in week two
description: The second group of celebrities are braced for culinary battle as they take on the MasterChef kitchen
content:
Celebrity MasterChef continues BBC One and BBC iPlayer with its 20th series, recorded earlier in the year with new 2025 judge Grace Dent and John Torode.

title: UK bank and building society customer protection limit to rise to £120,000
description: Increase of more than 40% from current figure of £85,000 will give more cover if financial firm goes bust
content:
The amount of a customer’s money protected if a UK bank or building society goes bust will rise to £120,000 next month, providing a boost to the nation’s savers.
The new deposit protection limit, a 41% rise from the current limit of £85,000, is highe... [3247 chars]

title: UK bank customer protection if firm goes bust rises to £120,000
description: Customers will see a significant increase in the amount of money protected if their bank collapses.
content:
Customers with bank accounts in the UK will see a significant increase in the amount of money that is protected if their bank or building society collapses.
